sentences.english: The sources of Chinese medicine are mainly floras, also includes animals and mineral.
sentences.chinese: 中药的来源主要是植物，也有一些动物和矿物。

sentences.english: Crushing of granites; mining of coal, minerals embedded in siliceous rocks.
sentences.chinese: 花岗岩粉碎，采煤，硅酸盐矿石内植入矿物。

sentences.english: Shen Zou operates mines in China that excavate fluorite and other minerals.
sentences.chinese: 申走在中国经营萤石矿，挖掘和其他矿物质。

sentences.english: Investigation was made on the mineral composition of a molybdenum ore.
sentences.chinese: 对某钼矿石进行了矿物成分分析。

sentences.english: It is made of Magnesium and Iron Silicate , and it is a member of the Chrysolite mineral family.
sentences.chinese: 它是由镁，矽铁，它是一个成员橄榄石矿物家庭。

sentences.english: The ore-forming materials were derived from the mantle.
sentences.chinese: 成矿物质初始来源于地幔。

sentences.english: A yellowish-brown nickel iron sulfide that is the principal ore of nickel.
sentences.chinese: 一种黄色矿物，含硫化镍，是少量镍的来源。

sentences.english: Snow is a mineral, just like diamonds and salt.
sentences.chinese: 雪是一种矿物，就像钻石和盐一样。

sentences.english: The niobium-tantalum and rare-earths ore deposits in China and their occurred minerals are described.
sentences.chinese: 该文对我国铌钽稀土矿床及其产出的矿物进行了论述。

sentences.english: The ore bearing wall rocks are composed mainly of siliceous phosphorites.
sentences.chinese: 与闪锌矿一起构成矿石的主要金属矿物。

sentences.english: Sphalerite is the main ore minerals.
sentences.chinese: 闪锌矿为主要的矿石矿物。

sentences.english: Yellow colour of straw. Apricot nose with mineral aromas.
sentences.chinese: 草黄色，有杏的香气并夹杂着矿物质的味道。

sentences.english: The garnet mineral is regarded as a well- performed natural grinding material.
sentences.chinese: 石榴石矿物是性能优良的天然磨料。

sentences.english: This resembles volcanic ash, which is predominantly composed of minerals such as pyroxene and olivine.
sentences.chinese: 这类似于火山灰，这是主要组成矿物如辉石和橄榄石。

sentences.english: Any of a group of common rock-forming hydrous silicate minerals.
sentences.chinese: 一族常见的矽酸盐类造岩矿物。

sentences.english: A white or gray mineral of potassium aluminum silicate kalsi2o6.
sentences.chinese: 白榴石一种白色或灰色的钾铝矽酸盐矿物。
